name: Orbital Vortex
description:
Orbital Vortex is a short, fast paced, action game where you control a drone who can fling around an orb to hit enemies, buttons and walls. 

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam and the theme was: Joined Together 

Press the blue fullscreen button for the best experience.

Programming and Visuals: BBomb, Xtopy and EvanDoesDev 

Level Design: BBomb

 Art: Hallowd Games

 Music and Sound: Hallowd Games 

Playtesting: DerpyDino 

Links to our channels can be found in game!
